name: The White Room
body:
![Aurora experience](aurora.jpg)
### Welcome to White Room.
We are working on next generation of entertainment solution that blurs the lines between the virtual world and the real world.

### A shared experience
Share and experience the world around you together with your friends.

### Let you imagination go wild
What if you are no longer bound to the limitation of the real world?
Where can you mind take you?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
